name: Compliance Online
overview:
ComplianceOnline, which began in 2004 and is based in Palo Alto, CA, is the largest GRC advisory network and leading provider of compliance training and resources, conducting online and in-person seminars on various regulatory related topics across industry verticals.

It is an industry-focused portal, developed for quality and regulatory compliance practitioners. ComplianceOnline seminars and webinars are led by recognized experts and industry veterans with decades of experience in regulatory affairs and issues. These training sessions deal with regulatory compliance, the design, development and implementation of compliance programs as well as the regulatory requirements of agencies like the FDA.

ComplianceOnline provides compliance training in the following categories:

Banking and Financial Services, Biotechnology, Clinical Compliance, Corporate Governance, EH&S Green Compliance, Energy and Utility, FAA Regulations, FDA Compliance, Food Safety Compliance, GSA Compliance, Healthcare Compliance, HR Compliance, IT control and PCI compliance, Laboratory Compliance, Medical Devices, OSHA Compliance, Packaging and Labeling, Pharmaceutical, Quality and ISO 9000 Compliance, Risk Management, SEC Compliance, SOX Compliance and Trade and Logistics Compliance.

ComplianceOnlineâ€™s seminars and learning resources delve deep into complex and exhaustive topics such as FDA regulations and FDA compliance, aimed at professionals working in industries closely regulated by the FDA.

Besides training seminars and webinars, ComplianceOnline also provides a comprehensive database of global regulations, regulatory best practices and articles about the latest regulatory compliance issues in the news. Renowned experts and recognized authorities in the field of regulatory compliance write articles about the latest regulatory changes affecting industries around the world. ComplianceOnline also provides the latest and up-to-date compliance standards necessary for quality and compliance practitioners.

Quality analysts, auditors, risk managers, compliance and other industry professionals looking for guidance on creating, developing and implementing compliance programs in their companies can use ComplianceOnline learning resources to understand the latest developments in regulations and how it affects them. They can buy and download compliance standards for the following industry verticals:

Aerospace, agriculture and farm machinery, automotive, aircraft & marine technology, banking, corp. finance & SOX, biotech & pharmaceutical standards, chemical technology, civil engineering and construction, computer hardware, electrical engineering, electronic equipment, energy and heat transfer engineering, environment & health protection, FDA audit, validation & documentation, food technology, GXP compliance tools new, HIPAA compliance, human resource, industry reports new, ISO published standards, IT and PCI compliance, leather and textile, manufacturing engineering, medical device and healthcare technology, metal, mining and minerals, packaging and distribution, paper and plastic industries, petroleum products, quality terminologies & documentations, safety engineering, test methods & procedures and trade supply chain and logistics.

ComplianceOnline hosts a Q&A forum for quality and compliance practitioners to interact with experts who lead the training sessions on the site. Here, they can place their questions on topics such as regulatory compliance, FDA regulations, global regulations, industry specific regulatory issues and compliance programs and the experts will answer their queries.
